DOC.brief_summary: The current study aim investigate effect dexamethasone exert fetal uteroplacental circulation measure Doppler ultrasonography pregnancy risk preterm birth 24 hour administration .
DOC.criteria: Patients risk preterm labor include preterm uterine contraction , placenta previa , mild preeclampsia Patients actively labor , presented premature rupture membrane , intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) , receive corticosteroids pregnancy and/or fetus suspect structural abnormality
